## Field class

Abstract class for an editable field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class Field implements IASTNodeLocationSvg, IASTNodeLocationWithBlock, IKeyboardAccessible, IRegistrable 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IASTNodeLocationSvg](./blockly.iastnodelocationsvg.md)<!-- -->, [IASTNodeLocationWithBlock](./blockly.iastnodelocationwithblock.md)<!-- -->, [IKeyboardAccessible](./blockly.ikeyboardaccessible.md)<!-- -->, [IRegistrable](./blockly.iregistrable.md)

## Constructors

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(value, opt\_validator, opt\_config)](./blockly.field._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Field</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [borderRect\_](./blockly.field.borderrect_.md) |  | SVGRectElement | The rendered field's SVG border element. |
|  [clickTarget\_](./blockly.field.clicktarget_.md) |  | Element | The element the click handler is bound to. |
|  [constants\_](./blockly.field.constants_.md) |  | ConstantProvider | Constants associated with the source block's renderer. |
|  [CURSOR](./blockly.field.cursor.md) |  | string | Mouse cursor style when over the hotspot that initiates the editor. |
|  [DEFAULT\_VALUE](./blockly.field.default_value.md) |  | any | The default value for this field. |
|  [EDITABLE](./blockly.field.editable.md) |  | boolean | Editable fields usually show some sort of UI indicating they are editable. They will also be saved by the serializer. |
|  [enabled\_](./blockly.field.enabled_.md) |  | boolean | Can the field value be changed using the editor on an editable block? |
|  [fieldGroup\_](./blockly.field.fieldgroup_.md) |  | SVGGElement | The rendered field's SVG group element. |
|  [isDirty\_](./blockly.field.isdirty_.md) |  | boolean | Does this block need to be re-rendered? |
|  [maxDisplayLength](./blockly.field.maxdisplaylength.md) |  | number | Maximum characters of text to display before adding an ellipsis. |
|  [name?](./blockly.field.name.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Name of field. Unique within each block. Static labels are usually unnamed. |
|  [NBSP](./blockly.field.nbsp.md) | <code>static</code> | (not declared) | Non-breaking space. |
|  [SERIALIZABLE](./blockly.field.serializable.md) |  | boolean | Serializable fields are saved by the serializer, non-serializable fields are not. Editable fields should also be serializable. This is not the case by default so that SERIALIZABLE is backwards compatible. |
|  [size\_](./blockly.field.size_.md) |  | Size |  |
|  [SKIP\_SETUP](./blockly.field.skip_setup.md) | <code>static</code> | Sentinel | A value used to signal when a field's constructor should \*not\* set the field's value or run configure\_, and should allow a subclass to do that instead. |
|  [sourceBlock\_](./blockly.field.sourceblock_.md) |  | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | Block this field is attached to. Starts as null, then set in init. |
|  [textContent\_](./blockly.field.textcontent_.md) |  | Text | The rendered field's text content element. |
|  [textElement\_](./blockly.field.textelement_.md) |  | SVGTextElement | The rendered field's SVG text element. |
|  [validator\_](./blockly.field.validator_.md) |  | Function | Validation function called when user edits an editable field. |
|  [value\_](./blockly.field.value_.md) |  | any |  |
|  [visible\_](./blockly.field.visible_.md) |  | boolean | Is the field visible, or hidden due to the block being collapsed? |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bindEvents\_()](./blockly.field.bindevents_.md) |  | Bind events to the field. Can be overridden by subclasses if they need to do custom input handling. |
|  [configure\_(config)](./blockly.field.configure_.md) |  | Process the configuration map passed to the field. |
|  [createBorderRect\_()](./blockly.field.createborderrect_.md) |  | Create a field border rect element. Not to be overridden by subclasses. Instead modify the result of the function inside initView, or create a separate function to call. |
|  [createTextElement\_()](./blockly.field.createtextelement_.md) |  | Create a field text element. Not to be overridden by subclasses. Instead modify the result of the function inside initView, or create a separate function to call. |
|  [doClassValidation\_(opt\_newValue)](./blockly.field.doclassvalidation_.md) |  | Used to validate a value. Returns input by default. Can be overridden by subclasses, see FieldDropdown. |
|  [doValueInvalid\_(\_invalidValue)](./blockly.field.dovalueinvalid_.md) |  | Used to notify the field an invalid value was input. Can be overridden by subclasses, see FieldTextInput. No-op by default. |
|  [doValueUpdate\_(newValue)](./blockly.field.dovalueupdate_.md) |  | Used to update the value of a field. Can be overridden by subclasses to do custom storage of values/updating of external things. |
|  [getAbsoluteXY\_()](./blockly.field.getabsolutexy_.md) |  | Return the absolute coordinates of the top-left corner of this field. The origin (0,0) is the top-left corner of the page body. |
|  [getClickTarget\_()](./blockly.field.getclicktarget_.md) |  | The element to bind the click handler to. If not set explicitly, defaults to the SVG root of the field. When this element is clicked on an editable field, the editor will open. |
|  [getConstants()](./blockly.field.getconstants.md) |  | Get the renderer constant provider. |
|  [getDisplayText\_()](./blockly.field.getdisplaytext_.md) |  | Get the text from this field to display on the block. May differ from <code>getText</code> due to ellipsis, and other formatting. |
|  [getFlipRtl()](./blockly.field.getfliprtl.md) |  | Returns whether or not we should flip the field in RTL. |
|  [getSize()](./blockly.field.getsize.md) |  | Returns the height and width of the field.<!-- -->This should \*in general\* be the only place render\_ gets called from. |
|  [getSourceBlock()](./blockly.field.getsourceblock.md) |  | Get the block this field is attached to. |
|  [getSvgRoot()](./blockly.field.getsvgroot.md) |  | Gets the group element for this editable field. Used for measuring the size and for positioning. |
|  [getText\_()](./blockly.field.gettext_.md) |  | A developer hook to override the returned text of this field. Override if the text representation of the value of this field is not just a string cast of its value. Return null to resort to a string cast. |
|  [getText()](./blockly.field.gettext.md) |  | Get the text from this field. Override getText\_ to provide a different behavior than simply casting the value to a string. |
|  [getTooltip()](./blockly.field.gettooltip.md) |  | Returns the tooltip text for this field. |
|  [getValidator()](./blockly.field.getvalidator.md) |  | Gets the validation function for editable fields, or null if not set. |
|  [getValue()](./blockly.field.getvalue.md) |  | Get the current value of the field. |
|  [isClickable()](./blockly.field.isclickable.md) |  | Check whether this field defines the showEditor\_ function. |
|  [isCurrentlyEditable()](./blockly.field.iscurrentlyeditable.md) |  | Check whether this field is currently editable. Some fields are never EDITABLE (e.g. text labels). Other fields may be EDITABLE but may exist on non-editable blocks or be currently disabled. |
|  [isEnabled()](./blockly.field.isenabled.md) |  | Check whether this field's value can be changed using the editor when the source block is editable. |
|  [isSerializable()](./blockly.field.isserializable.md) |  | Check whether this field should be serialized by the XML renderer. Handles the logic for backwards compatibility and incongruous states. |
|  [isTabNavigable()](./blockly.field.istabnavigable.md) |  | Returns whether or not the field is tab navigable. |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.field.isvisible.md) |  | Gets whether this editable field is visible or not. |
|  [loadLegacyState(callingClass, state)](./blockly.field.loadlegacystate.md) |  | Loads the given state using either the old XML hooks, if they should be used. Returns true to indicate loading has been handled, false otherwise. |
|  [onMouseDown\_(e)](./blockly.field.onmousedown_.md) |  | Handle a mouse down event on a field. |
|  [onShortcut(\_shortcut)](./blockly.field.onshortcut.md) |  | Handles the given keyboard shortcut. |
|  [positionBorderRect\_()](./blockly.field.positionborderrect_.md) |  | Position a field's border rect after a size change. |
|  [positionTextElement\_(xOffset, contentWidth)](./blockly.field.positiontextelement_.md) |  | Position a field's text element after a size change. This handles both LTR and RTL positioning. |
|  [render\_()](./blockly.field.render_.md) |  | Used by getSize() to move/resize any DOM elements, and get the new size.<!-- -->All rendering that has an effect on the size/shape of the block should be done here, and should be triggered by getSize(). |
|  [saveLegacyState(callingClass)](./blockly.field.savelegacystate.md) |  | Returns a stringified version of the XML state, if it should be used. Otherwise this returns null, to signal the field should use its own serialization. |
|  [setEnabled(enabled)](./blockly.field.setenabled.md) |  | Set whether this field's value can be changed using the editor when the source block is editable. |
|  [setSourceBlock(block)](./blockly.field.setsourceblock.md) |  | Attach this field to a block. |
|  [setTooltip(newTip)](./blockly.field.settooltip.md) |  | Sets the tooltip for this field. |
|  [setValidator(handler)](./blockly.field.setvalidator.md) |  | Sets a new validation function for editable fields, or clears a previously set validator.<!-- -->The validator function takes in the new field value, and returns validated value. The validated value could be the input value, a modified version of the input value, or null to abort the change.<!-- -->If the function does not return anything (or returns undefined) the new value is accepted as valid. This is to allow for fields using the validated function as a field-level change event notification. |
|  [setValue(newValue)](./blockly.field.setvalue.md) |  | Used to change the value of the field. Handles validation and events. Subclasses should override doClassValidation\_ and doValueUpdate\_ rather than this method. |
|  [showEditor\_(\_e)](./blockly.field.showeditor_.md) |  | A developer hook to create an editor for the field. This is no-op by default, and must be overriden to create an editor. |
|  [updateEditable()](./blockly.field.updateeditable.md) |  | Add or remove the UI indicating if this field is editable or not. |
|  [updateMarkers\_()](./blockly.field.updatemarkers_.md) |  | Redraw any attached marker or cursor svgs if needed. |
|  [updateSize\_(opt\_margin)](./blockly.field.updatesize_.md) |  | Updates the size of the field based on the text. |
